# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/etsoi.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/etsoi.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/hemt.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/hemt.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/etsoi.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> etsoi.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/etsoi.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;mvs2;adms")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/etsoi.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP etsoi.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/etsoi.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} etsoi.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MVS2/etsoi.cir.prn etsoi.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/etsoi.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED etsoi.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/hemt.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> hemt.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/hemt.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;mvs2;adms")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/hemt.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP hemt.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/hemt.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} hemt.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MVS2/hemt.cir.prn hemt.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}MVS2/hemt.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED hemt.cir)
endif()
